ApproxsimClient.communication
Class SubscriptionCounter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.communication.SubscriptionCounter

public class SubscriptionCounter
extends Object

This class is used to monitor the intensity of the communication between the client and the server. If this comunication is intensive, the progess bar in ClientMainFrame.java is started.

Method Summary
static void endTimer()
          Ends the timer and sets the progress bar in ClientMainFrame to zero.

          Starts the timer and the progress bar in ClientMainFrame.
